I think that mushroom looks good in heels.
Ohhhhh yes darling, heels make the woman.(Or man~) http://img14.deviantart.net/16f5/i/2016/043/e/0/walkingmelonsaaa_s_fabulous_mettaton_ex____by_yamsgarden-d9rjc5g.jpg
I'll compromise with "Sexy beast"
Mettaton is definitely male
Isn't mettaton a technically genderless robot?

Transgender robot. Mettaton is male, but the thing he was before becoming a robot was female. 

You can look it up if you want, I didn't wanna spoil it for anyone though.
Thank you, dear! https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/670791689783664640/_gooP08Z.png
that's not heels, it's his manly tusks!
I didn't know you could get points off the flames.

Wait... WHAT?!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

If you haven't played Super Mario Bros 3 before, there's a powerup, the Tanooki suit (like the one Mario's wearing in the gif), transforms you into a statue, become invulnerable and can't take any action for a short time.

Sounds familiar...

Now you do!

~~You tought it was cuter version of the leaf powerup didn't you! ~~

Yes and no. Each had their place. Just like each color in MTG has its merits... I FUCKING HATE WHITE STILL THOUGH!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

THIS GUY GETS IT! EMBRACE THE ANGER! GROW STRONGER! DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES!
 I WILL RULE JUND FOREVER!!! MWAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!
But other news... Fuck Blue and fuck White, damn counterspells and field wipes...
Why can't they let me eat about 50 of my own tokens to make a massive [Kresh](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=174876).
I mean it doesn't harm them, right?
Right?...
FeelsJundman
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

I have a Sydri Esper artifact control EDH deck, my Temur Riku of Two Reflections EDH deck, and I want to make a Grixis Thraxmundar Zombie EDH deck... Notice a common color? I know you hate me and I love it... I only need some islands open to ruin a day...

Add in some Red to REALLY send someone for a loop! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} Redirect x2 and Reverberate x2 (Or just two Wild Ricochets) to ruin a plan.

White by itself is generally a pretty tame and predictable color. It has the best boardwipes and tokens by just cheer numbers, but it lacks draw, ramp, or the actual speed of red making it the weakest stand alone color in my opinion.
Yeah that is true that it can be tame... But my god do I hate the exile, damage negation, heal spells, etc. Too many things to figure out what to counterspell.

white black token op

30 white black spirit tokens with flying and lifesteal on turn 3

(i dont feel bad at all)

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=L0AqsEcM,comment-id=00000000000000000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-14T01:07:29.480+0000)

> Never got it. Or seen it played.
> 
> *Derps*

That card was so broken even MTG said in a statement that they will never reprint that card. Google it if you don't know what it means.

I know what reprints are... *looks at all the reprinted Cancels*

That is just funny.
that... thats evil... thats VERY evil... like how is Stormtide not Mythic Rare with those Abilities? Like jesus only spells could kill it.
It requires 8 mana to cast in a Blue deck. Three of which MUST be Islands. It's a fair price for a Rare. If you want to see Mythic Rare look up Elderscale When.

Have you ever won with this combo?

http://media-dominaria.cursecdn.com/avatars/thumbnails/97/893/200/283/397816.full.jpg + http://media-dominaria.cursecdn.com/avatars/thumbnails/98/892/200/283/383309.full.jpg
(Yes i know it was never standard but standard requires that i keep my decks modernized.)
Nope, Splinter Twin was before M13 if I'm not mistaken.
it is much more evil than your combo at least. turn four all enemies take infinity from infinite minions.
That's just nasty.
The opponent had two untapped islands.
I have counter spells as well.

Probably not unless you have a crap ton of mana artifacts or a splash of green as well, otherwise it will take forever to set up that combo and will tap yourself out to play all those bombs.

If we're talking about multiplayer commander though, then anything is possible {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
2 Guilded Lotus & 4 Wardens of Jwar island. That got the 2 dragons out for 4 & 3 mana each. That was in a FNM match, shocked my opponent (and myself) at how fast they came out.
